movie.title: Flight 93
movie.plot: On September 11th 2001, four domestic flights are hijacked by terrorists in the United States of America. After the collision of three against selected targets, the passengers and crew of United Airlines Flight 93 fight against four terrorists to take back the control of the airplane.
movie.awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 3 wins & 9 nominations.
